nodes.text: Tar-fuel was a substance with a strong smell that was used for starship fuel.

In 19 BBY, freighter pilot Nyreen Vollen used tar-fuel on her ship Cornucopia to hide the scent of Jedi Kina Ha and Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy from an akk dog the stormtroopers were using to inspect her ship.
